questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a part of the male reproductive system?

Which hormone is primarily responsible for male sexual characteristics?

What is the primary function of the uterus?

What is the term for the release of an egg from the ovary?

What is the term for attraction to both males and females?

choices: Increased interest in dating and sexuality
questions.answer: Increased interest in dating and sexuality

questions.question: What is the primary function of the fallopian tubes?
choices: Carry eggs from ovaries to uterus
questions.answer: Carry eggs from ovaries to uterus

questions.question: Which hormone is primarily responsible for the development of female secondary sexual characteristics?

choices: Puberty happens at the same age for everyone
Mood swings are a normal part of puberty

questions.question: What is the term for the fluid that contains sperm?

What is the primary function of the prostate gland?
Which of the following is a recommended way to support friends or family members going through puberty?
choices: Provide accurate information and emotional support
Encourage them to hide their changes
questions.answer: Provide accurate information and emotional support

questions.question: What is the term for the external female genitalia?
Which of the following is NOT mentioned as a type of gender identity in the module?
What is the primary function of the vas deferens?
Which of the following is a recommended topic for the puberty changes poster assignment?
What is the purpose of the anonymous question box activity mentioned in the module?
choices: To allow students to ask sensitive questions without embarrassment
To collect personal information about students
To assign grades based on question quality
questions.answer: To allow students to ask sensitive questions without embarrassment
